import React,{useState} from 'react' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux'; export default function PaymentMethodScreen(props) { const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState('PayPal') const dispatch = useDispatch() const submitHandler = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); dispatch(savePaymentMethod(paymentMethod)); props.history.push('/placorder') } return (

Payment Method

setPaymentMethod(e.target.value)} >
